committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Shawnee Parkway as a unit of the National Park System with in the State of West Virginia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Shawnee National Parkway Act of 1990 - Designates certain lands and interests in lands conveyed to the United States by the State of West Virginia as the Shawnee Parkway. Requires such parkway to be administered and maintained by the Secretary of the Interior, through the National Park Service, as a national parkway. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To establish the Shawnee Parkway as a unit of the National Park System with in the State of West Virginia, and for other purposes.
